On 2011-12-19 13:32, Roy T. Fielding wrote:
> ...
> Period. End of story. Hence, PATCH was defined in 1995 (and finally

> ...

What exactly does this have to do with WebDAV? Do you think WebDAV 
should have defined PATCH?

Best regards, Julian
